resources.string:
I, Kashif have not lost my Android career, 
App career not at all because I am in decent form in Flutter. 

I just didn't like the short-lasting culture of Google's Android Team, the android development ecosystem has got more unstable, fragmented and unorganized because of them, 

 They are not doing well thought changes and having built-to-last principles, 

 but rather they are always seem to be making changes without much thinking and later they themselves deprecate and change whole approach.
